item.description:
Hey Craft Beer lovers!

It's time for the first official meetup in quite a while! I've been working with a friend of mine who manages events for Tommy Doyles in Harvard Square, and we've organized a Pumpkin Beer tasting event at The Crimson Lounge in Tommy Doyle's bar. We worked pretty hard putting this together to be an awesome, really fun event. Most meetups will be free, but to cover the cost of food, free beer samples, and live music, this one costs $25, but it includes all of this:

A 5 oz sample of each of these!

Cape Ann Pumpkin Stout

Dogfish Head Punkin’

Wachusett Imperial Pumpkin

Sam Adams Harvest Pumpkin AND Imperial Pumpkin

Post Road Pumpkin

Shipyard Smashed Pumpkin

Uinta Pumpkin

Harpoon Pumpkin UFO

Weyerbacher Imperial Pumpkin

Saranac Pumpkin

Wolaver’s Organic Pumpkin

Smuttynose Pumpkin

Also,

Pumpkin-themed buffet spread

DJ and live blues music

Free beer swag

An awesome meetup!

 

To get your ticket, head to the eventbrite:

http://pumpkinfest11.eventbrite.com/
item.name: Try lots of Pumpkin Beers & Food at Pumpkinfest 2011!
